SEARCH
Package org.red5.net.websocket.server

Class WsWriteTimeout

java.lang.Object
org.red5.net.websocket.server.WsWriteTimeout
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.tomcat.websocket.BackgroundProcess
public class WsWriteTimeout extends Object implements org.apache.tomcat.websocket.BackgroundProcess
Provides timeouts for asynchronous web socket writes. On the server side we only have access to ServletOutputStream and ServletInputStream so there is no way to set a timeout for writes to the client.
Author:
mondain
